titleStmt.title: On the death of the Right Honourable Thomas Earl of Ossory.
titleStmt.author: Flatman, Thomas, 1637-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Dublin by Benjamin Tooke and John Crooke, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majestie; and are to be sold by Mary Crooke at his Majesties Printing-house in Skinner-Row.,
